scripts.serve:electron: set APP_IS_NIGHTLY=yes && set APP_IS_DEV=yes && pnpm build && wait-on tcp:3000 && electron .
scripts.app:build: pnpm prod:rename && pnpm build:front && pnpm electron:build && pnpm electron:builder
scripts.app:build:nightly: set APP_IS_NIGHTLY=yes && set APP_IS_DEV=no && pnpm nightly:rename && pnpm build:front && pnpm electron:build && pnpm electron:builder
scripts.nightly:rename: json -I -f package.json -e "this.name='SIM'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.productName='SIM Nightly'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.appId='com.sim.hack.app'"
scripts.prod:rename: json -I -f package.json -e "this.name='SIM'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.productName='SIM'" && json -I -f package.json -e "this.build.appId='com.sim.hack.app'"
